Just as Lord Elder, and Kup thought that Night Shift's communication abilit=
ies were blacked out, Night Shift uses his internal cerebral com link which=
 he had as a backup unit, in case his external transmitter was broken, and =
gets through to Lord Elder on a Maximal channel.  Yet, this one could only =
transmit text messages on the computer.  This time he sends to both Lord El=
der, Kup and Lord Perseus at the Maximal base.

" SOS guys, cover's blown. =
 Hydras is gonna attempt ta torture me, I'll do what I can ta raise a stink=
 on my end, but I dunno how much time that's gonna buy me.  Yeah, I need ta=
 be bailed out.  Bit off more than I could chew, over.  Gotta split.  And m=
aybe literally..  Night Shift out.  PS: Sendn' distress beacon now."

This =
message now reaches Tucson Prime who gasps.

Tucson looks to Depthcharge.  =
He had to change his plans.. Pronto.

" Depthcharge, I hate to do this to y=
ou but I have a change in agenda. I just got an emergency distress beacon f=
rom Night Shift, he's in trouble, and it looks like he needs my help!  Talo=
n, Nightshift needs me, I'm sorry, but I have to again.  I love you too muc=
h to lose you to Hydras and the others.  Stay safe with Lord Perseus, I'll =
be back here as soon as I get Night Shift out of danger. As soon as I get h=
im out of there, I'll be back to talk to Nightstrike.  I promise, this isn'=
t forever."

He gives Talon a kiss on her cheek and holds her hand briefly =
before moving away, and quickly transforming to missile truck mode.  He's q=
uick to drive out of the base, and outside, where he's met by Quickstride.
=

"Hey, what's the rush sir?!"

Tucson stops briefly.

"Rescue mission, I'm =
sorry but I'm in a bit of a hurry."

Quickstride transforms into his robot =
mode.

"Heeey, you almost got inta trouble that first time, at least take s=
ome backup with ya!"

Rat Trap also joins him.

"Ditto! Ya aint' don' this =
alone!"

Tucson opens his cab, to both Maximals, as they get in.

" I suppo=
se there's not talking you two out of this.  All right, it could get danger=
ous though."

Rat Trap grins.

"Yeah, goes with the job I suppose.  Rat Tra=
p ta Lord Elder, over, we got Nightshifts' distress beacon and we got Tucso=
n Prime with us, get ready for a real fireworks display because the big bot=
's really cheesed off this time."

Tucson accelerates to over a hundred mil=
es per hour, getting further away from the Maximal Base.
He activates his d=
istress signal on his internal com link.  

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, =
Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Who: LORD ELDER, Kup, Elita
=
> Location: The Ark's command center
> 
> > "Maybe the situation isnt so se=
rious as it looks"said doutbly Kup
> 
> Lord Elder nodded as he received fu=
rther word from Tuscon, "You may be right."
> 
> Elder looked at his screen=
 in front of him, "But two things still bug
> me." he said as he manipulate=
d the controls in front of him, "That
> sensor ghost has been with us for q=
uite some time. We cannot know what
> it is seen. If it is Predacon or Mini=
on it could be a spy." Elder
> frowned, "and if it is, we don't know what i=
t has seen, and what it
> has communicated to its masters."
> 
> Elder star=
ted to open a channel to Nightshift, but then remembered
> that he was in a=
 communications black out, "Also I am worried about
> Nightshift. The Preda=
cons are not idiots. I wish we had spent more
> time thinking this plan thr=
ough. Just trapsing into the predacon
> headquarters with only the predacon=
 spark signature was probably not
> the best plan." Elder tapped his finger=
s on the console in
> frustration, "I wish we knew what was going on!"
